name: todos
description: A todo app to practice NestJs

scripts.lint: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names lint:api,lint:ui "npm run lint:api" "npm run lint:ui"
scripts.lint-staged: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names lint:api:staged,lint:ui:staged "npm run lint:api:staged" "npm run lint:ui:staged"
scripts.pretty-quick: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names pretty-quick:api,pretty-quick:ui "npm run pretty-quick:api" "npm run pretty-quick:ui"
scripts.quality: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names quality:api,quality:ui "npm run quality:api" "npm run quality:ui"
scripts.quality:api: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names lint:api,test:api "npm run lint:api" "npm run test:api"
scripts.quality:ui: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names lint:ui,test:ui "npm run lint:ui" "npm run test:ui"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names start:api,start:ui "npm run start:api" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names test:api,test:ui "npm run test:api" "npm run test:ui"
scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names watch:api,watch:ui "npm run watch:api" "npm run watch:ui"
